intro.title: HEAVY EQUIPMENT CONTRACT SERVICE
intro.subtitle: Full Maintenance & Operational Solutions from THEI
intro.description:
THEI (PT. TJM Heavy Equipment Indonesia) provides Heavy Equipment Contract Service — a comprehensive maintenance and operational program for companies relying on heavy equipment units in projects, mining, construction, logistics, and manufacturing industries.

Through 3-month, 6-month, and 1-year contract systems, THEI ensures your units operate optimally, efficiently, and with minimal downtime, supported by certified professional technicians and an integrated monitoring system.
intro.whatIsDesc: Contract Service is a total heavy equipment maintenance partnership, where THEI is responsible for routine maintenance, repairs, overhauls, and replacement of critical components — at a fixed cost and schedule as per the agreement. Clients can focus solely on project productivity, while THEI handles all technical aspects of the units.

oneYear.title: 1-YEAR PACKAGE
features: Full corrective support & major component overhaul (engine, pump, transmission)
Productivity analysis, cost efficiency, and unit history
Full spare part management & digital inventory
Replacement plan up to main components
Full operator & mechanic training + THEI internal certification
